title: Boxa
text:
Boxa is an Australian <a href="boxing">boxing</a>, <a href="mixed%20martial%20arts">mixed martial arts</a> and clothing brand that was founded in <a href="Sydney">Sydney</a>, <a href="Australia">Australia</a> in 2001. World boxing champion and former professional <a href="rugby%20league">rugby league</a> footballer <a href="Anthony%20Mundine">Anthony Mundine</a> started the brand as a <a href="boxing%20glove">boxing glove</a>s and <a href="helmet">helmet</a>s company, but it eventually branched out into <a href="clothing">clothing</a> as well and a "Boxa Bar" <a href="coffeehouse">cafe</a> in <a href="Hurstville">Hurstville</a>.
The Boxa Bar was destroyed by fire in November 2013. At the time the fire was being investigated by police and being treated as suspicious.
Sponsorships.
In addition to Mundine advertising his own company's sportswear, several celebrity athlete friends of Mundine also endorse Boxa products.
